I AM THE IRON FIST: At the end of your turn, if Iron Fist didn't move or make an attack this turn, give him a Chi token. // FREE: Remove any number of Chi tokens to make that many close attacks against different targets, maximum damage value 3.

March 27, 2021
cluckypower
I like him. I have gotten a lot of use out of him pairing him up with the Shifting Focus Dr. Strange to teleport him around while he accumulates Chi tokens. Once he is ready to attack he is a 11 attack 3 damage while next to Dr. Strange. I also equip with him the knobbed mace so the enemies he hits have a less of chance to hit him back.
